Articles.Content:
I would like someone to make a new mod that is a replica of the Orion service module. All of the current Orion replicas don't look very good or have too many parts. I would like someone to make the following parts:

2.5m Orion Pod (Crew of 4) With IVA if possible 

2.5m Service module fuel tank (LFO and Monopropellent) Look at the picture in the link. (Make it look like the SDHI one)

1.25m low profile engine (Medium thrust with good effiency)

1.25m triple parachute

Here is a link to some Orion info and a picture:

[http://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Orion_(spacecraft)](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Orion_%28spacecraft%29)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-06T00:38:15Z" title="05/06/2015 12:38  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 6, 2015</time> by Laythe Dweller**

None of all the parts you need are updated to 1.0 but you can edit the files to update them, Did you look at the American Pack but again it needs updated ?

EDIT- If you liked the CMES one, I'll edit the files and rescale it if thats what you want ?
I'm looking for a completely brand-new mod to be made so that people don't have to piece together parts from various packs. I would do it myself, but I don't know how to model, texture or make IVAs.

You know how many have started and die ? A bunch and there's a couple that are still a WIP and you just want the Orion ? or launcher too ?

EDIT- OK will PM when done.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-06T01:14:23Z" title="05/06/2015 01:14  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 6, 2015</time> by Mecripp2**
Just the capsule and service module.
hmmm, I think that Chaka Monkey has a pack dedicated to Orion! I'm sure you could pull the capsule and service module from there!
But those are 3.75m and there are too many parts. Remember, I am looking for someone to make a whole new mod.

Mhm.

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85275-WIP-NASA-SLS-Released-Orion-MPCV-Core-Module-1-0-4-18-2015](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85275-WIP-NASA-SLS-Released-Orion-MPCV-Core-Module-1-0-4-18-2015)![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Supposed to be incorporated with [ChakaMonkey](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/64993-0-90-Chaka-Monkey-Exploration-Odyssey-0-27-1-EFT-1-Commemorative-Edition) soon enough last I heard.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-06T01:41:35Z" title="05/06/2015 01:41  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 6, 2015</time> by Motokid600**
That doesn't look like the Orion capsule at ALL...

> 
> That doesn't look like the Orion capsule at ALL...

Maybe check out some blender tutorials?

> 
> That doesn't look like the Orion capsule at ALL...

Actually if that is very close to what the Orion does and will look like. ![imagefull-369.jpg](https://jscfeatures.jsc.nasa.gov/images/imagefull-369.jpg)

He is making a white version and I believe that is the one that will be released but yes that is what the Orion capsule looks like. Also don't forget it doesn't have the docking/parachute cap.
But black isn't very pretty on a space craft.

> 
> You know how many have started and die ? A bunch and there's a couple that are still a WIP and you just want the Orion ? or launcher too ?
> EDIT- OK will PM when done.

Could you make it look like the one in the picture on the link? I will be gone for 2 weeks on vacation so that should give you plenty of time. Thank you for all the help!

> 
> Could you make it look like the one in the picture on the link? I will be gone for 2 weeks on vacation so that should give you plenty of time. Thank you for all the help!

Considering that many of us here have lives outside of KSP (imagine that), that's a bit tight of a deadline.

If you want something of high quality (which most of us do), then let the person who's fielding the request complete it when they feel it is finished - NOT when you think it should be completed.
noonespecial is currently working on an Orion Capsule atm.

CMES is pretty close to your picture ![screenshot1.png](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/UFO/screenshot1.png)![screenshot2.png](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/UFO/screenshot2.png)

EDIT- If, I would have left the textures has they was it would look better.
Oh, I also forgot, Chaka Monkey is working on breaking up his mod into seperate packs, so, sit tight, he'll have the stuff up is a more useable level.
